scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && cargo test --package zswap-integration-tests -- --nocapture
scripts.test:integration:swap: npm run build && cargo test --package zswap-integration-tests --test swap -- --nocapture
scripts.test:integration:mint: npm run build && cargo test --package zswap-integration-tests --test mint -- --nocapture
scripts.postinstall: echo no frontend && echo rs tests && echo rs contract
